naslov: RAŽANJ 150 metara DO MORA, VILLA S BAZENOM I POMOĆNIM OBJEKTIMA (prodaja)
opis: PREDIVNA VILLA S BAZENOM U RAŽNJU! Posredujemo u prodaji iznimne nekretnine u Ražnju na mirnoj lokaciji u blizini mora. Izgrađena je na parceli površine 524m2. Na prvom dijelu parcele smještena je kuća koja se sastoji od: prizemlja (trosoban stan) s predivnim ograđenim dvorom te 1.kata (dvosoban stan) s prostranom terasom. Na drugom dijelu parcele smješteni su dodatni pomoćni objekti (ljetna kuhinja, kamin i sl.) te bazen sa sunčalištem, jacuzzijem i vanjskim tuševima. Kompletna parcela je ograđena, pažljivo hortikulturno zasađena mediteranskim biljem i zelenilom, te pruža intimu i mir, zaklonjena od pogleda se ulice. Parking prostor na parceli je osiguran za više automobila. Dodatni bonus, koji vlasnik ville nudi je vez za brod u obližnjoj lučici i tri veza u uvali Stivašnica. Za dodatne informacije, kao i dogovor za obilazak nekretnine, kontaktirajte se agenta na mobitel: 099 698 54 74 ili 091 576 47 49 Splitski rišpet d.o.o. kao ovlašteni posrednik u prometu nekretnina od kupca naplaćuje posredničku naknadu sukladno Općim uvjetima poslovanja. Na razgledavanje nekretnine vodimo samo one kupce koji prihvaćaju navedene uvjete uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju. Villa „Mediterranean Life“ allows you to live life in the Mediterranean. The villa consists of two parts, daily life in privacy and intimacy and classic home life. The villa consists of 2 apartments (ground floor and first floor), and numerous living facilities in the second part of the house and grounds in the garden and ground floor. Basic information: • Land size: about 530 m² • Size of living area: about 200 m² • Distance from the sea and the beach: 50 m to the south as the crow flies, 200 m to the north • Distance from the town centre: 300 m • Papers in order with a use permit The villa in the classic, residential sense has 2 separate apartments and a separate area for daily rest: APARTMENT ON THE GROUND FLOOR: 3 double rooms Toilet with shower Kitchen with living room Corridor Covered terrace with a table for 12 people, about 35 m² in size Parking for 4 cars (2 covered and 2 uncovered) Outdoor living room kitchen with a large sink 2 grills Auxiliary stone house 18 m² Basement/tool room Water tank as a reserve Outdoor shower Recreational area FLAT ON THE FLOOR: 2 double rooms Toilet with shower Kitchen with living room Covered terrace of about 30 m² GARDEN SPACE FOR DAILY HOLIDAYS Separate entrance from the road, but also entrance through the garden on the ground floor Parking for 4-5 cars Outdoor facility with a modern top-quality kitchen and day and night party space WC Barbecue Covered dining area with a table for 8 people next to the grill Glazed sunbathing area for nudists Jacuzzi for 6 people Swimming pool Shower with hot water Special space for evening intimacy Sunbathing area with sunbeds Boat parking Table for table tennis CELLAR / TOOL ROOM BOAT MOORING UP TO 6 m IN THE LOCAL HARBOR SEMI-PRIVATE BATHING AREA AT THE SEA WITH UMBRELLAS AND CHAIRS MOORING IN THE BAY FOR 3 BOATS
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Ured agencije: Put Plokita 87, 21000 Split, Splitsko-dalmatinska, Hrvatska
